articles.author: James Kuanal
articles.title: Rishabh Pant, Ravindra Jadeja and Ravichandran Ashwin named in Australia’s WTC Team of the Tournament - Sportskeeda
articles.description: On Wednesday, Cricket Australia (CA) unveiled the ICC World Test Championship (WTC) Team of the Tournament.
articles.content: On Wednesday, Cricket Australia (CA) unveiled the ICC World Test Championship (WTC) Team of the Tournament. The XI featured three Indian players Ravindra Jadeja, Rishabh Pant, and Ravichandran Ashwin… [+2018 chars]
